subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets (9-3), led by seven shutout innings from Jacob deGrom, defeated the Marlins, 5-4, giving them a seven-game winning streak for the first time since June 2010.
snippet: The Mets (9-3), led by seven shutout innings from Jacob deGrom, defeated the Marlins, 5-4, giving them a seven-game winning streak for the first time since June 2010.
